text: Mariyu allah oka nagarapu upamanam istunnadu: Modata adi (a nagaram) santi bhadratalato nindi undedi. Daniki (dani prajalaku) prati dikkunundi jivanopadhi puskalanga labhistu undedi. Taruvata (a nagaram) varu allah anugrahalanu tiraskarincaru (krtaghnulayyaru), kavuna allah vari caryalaku baduluga variki akali, bhayamu vanti apadala ruci cupincadu
